data.text: Mɛgyina mʼahwɛeɛ na mawɛn.
Afei, Awurade buaa sɛ,
Adiyisɛm no retwɛn hyɛberɛ bi;
“Hwɛ, wama ne ho so;
Nokorɛm, nsã ayi no ama
“Nnommumfoɔ yi nyinaa bɛdi ne ho fɛ asere no aka sɛ,
Wɔn a wode wɔn ka no bɛsɔre mpofirim so.
Esiane sɛ woafo aman bebree enti,
“Nnome nka deɛ ɔde korɔnodeɛ kyekyere ne ɔman,
Woatu nnipa bebree sɛeɛ ho agyina,
Aboɔ a ɛhyehyɛ afie afasuo mu no bɛteam
“Nnome nka deɛ ɔnam mogya hwieguo so kyekyere kuropɔn
Asafo Awurade ahyɛ sɛ,
Na Awurade animuonyam ho nimdeɛ bɛhyɛ asase nyinaa ma,
“Due! Wo a woma wo mfɛfoɔ nsã,
Worennya animuonyam biara. Wʼani bɛwu.
Awurukasɛm a wode adi Lebanon no bɛmene wo,
“Ɛdeɛn mfasodeɛ na monya firi ahoni a onipa ayɛ mu?
Nnome nka deɛ ɔka kyerɛ dua sɛ, ‘Nya nkwa!’
Nanso Awurade wɔ nʼasɔrefie kronkron mu.
